edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class ThresholdList<T extends Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.ThresholdList<T>

public class ThresholdList<T extends Comparable<T>>
extends Object

Sorted list which holds condition monitoring requests for event monitors. Will trigger notification to condition nodes of a state change if current value of metric surpasses threshold value of any conditions registered in list.

Author:
darts
See Also:
CurrentNode

Constructor Detail

ThresholdList

public ThresholdList(boolean descend)
Sorted list which holds condition monitoring requests for event monitors. Will trigger notification to condition nodes of a state change if current value of metric surpasses threshold value of any conditions registered in list.

Parameters:
descend - True to indicate a descending order sorted list (minimum threshold), False to indicate ascending order sorted list (maximum threshold)
Method Detail

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()

thresholdPassed

public boolean thresholdPassed(T current)
Determine if threshold at head of list has been surpassed.

Parameters:
current - current value of metric
Returns:
true if threshold has been surpassed by current value

pophead

public ThresholdNode<T> pophead()
Pop ThresholdNode from head of list and return to caller.

Returns:
ThresholdNode which was previously at head of list, or null if list is empty

insert

public void insert(int monitorId,
                   T threshold,
                   long period,
                   ExpressionNode node)
Insert new condition to be monitored into list. These are conditions which monitor if a metric has surpassed a certain threshold. Conditions will be inserted into list in sorted order, with thresholds nearest to the current value at the head of the list.

Parameters:
monitorId - unique id of monitor
threshold - threshold value which should trigger a notification to the condition node
period - maximum allowed period (in milliseconds) for monitoring of this condition
node - link to ConditionNode which registered this condition monitor

remove

public void remove(int monitorId)
Remove condition matching this monitorId. Does nothing if there is no match.

Parameters:
monitorId - unique id of monitor to remove

getMinPeriod

public long getMinPeriod()
Return minimum of the maximum allowed periods for conditions in list. This determines maximum allowed period before next update.

Returns:
maximum allowed period for all conditions in list

setMinPeriod

private void setMinPeriod()
Determine new minimum of the maximum allowed periods for all conditions in list. This is necessary if the previous minimum was removed from list.
